text: Tamen wulun zai nali chuxian, dou yao xianru beijian zhi zhong, chufei jie an la de heyue yu zhongren de heyue fang neng anju, tamen ying shou an la de qian nu, tamen yao xianyu kunku zhi zhong. Zhe shi yinwei tamen bu xin an la de jixiang, erqie wang sha zhong xianzhi, zhe you shi yinwei tamen weikang zhuming, chaoyue fadu
